table.caption: Table 222 – Additional entries common to all fields containing variable text
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Required; inheritable) The default appearance string containing a sequence of valid page-content graphics or text state operators that define such properties as the field’s text size and colour.

(Optional; inheritable) A code specifying the form of quadding (justification) that is used in displaying the text:
0 Left-justified
1 Centered
2 Right-justified
Default value: 0 (left-justified).

(Optional; PDF 1.5) A default style string, as described in
12.7.3.4, “Rich Text Strings.”

(Optional; PDF 1.5) A rich text string, as described in
12.7.3.4, “Rich Text Strings.”
